inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Perf
| where CounterName == "% Processor Time" and InstanceName == "_Total"
| where Computer == "US-AZR-ULAPP01" or Computer contains "21876623"
| summarize avgCPU=avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-1d) 
| where CounterName == "% Used Memory"
| where Computer == "US-AZR-ULAPP01" or Computer contains "21876623"
| summarize avgMEM=avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-1d) 
| where Computer == "US-AZR-ULAPP01" or Computer contains "21876623"
| where CounterName == "Disk Transfers/sec"
| summarize avgDISK=avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| render timechart

content.Query:
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-1d) 
| where Computer == "US-AZR-ULAPP01" or Computer contains "21876623"
| where CounterName == "% Used Space" 
| summarize avgDISK=avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-1d) 
| where Computer == "US-AZR-ULAPP01" or Computer contains "21876623"
| where CounterName == "Total Bytes"
| summarize avgNETinGB=avg(((CounterValue / 1024) / 1024) / 1024) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), Computer
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-1d) 
| where Computer contains "21876623"
| where CounterName == "% Processor Time" and InstanceName == "_Total"
| project CounterName, cpu=CounterValue, Computer, TimeGenerated
| join kind=inner (
    ContainerInventory
    | where TimeGenerated > now(-1d) 
    | where ContainerState == "Running" 
    | project Image, Computer, TimeGenerated
    )
on Computer
| summarize avgCPU=avg(cpu) by Image, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-1d) 
| where Computer contains "21876623"
| where CounterName == "% Used Memory"
| project CounterName, mem=CounterValue, Computer, TimeGenerated
| join kind=inner (
    ContainerInventory
    | where TimeGenerated > now(-1d) 
    | where ContainerState == "Running" 
    | project Image, Computer, TimeGenerated
    )
on Computer
| summarize avgMEM=avg(mem) by Image, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
ContainerLog
| where TimeGenerated > now(-1d) 
| where Computer contains "21876623"
| summarize count(LogEntrySource) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
| render timechart

content.Query:
ContainerLog
| where TimeGenerated > now(-1d) 
| where Computer contains "21876623" and LogEntry contains "ERROR"
| summarize count(LogEntrySource) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
ContainerServiceLog  
| where TimeGenerated > now(-1d) 
| where Computer contains "21876623" 
| summarize count(Command) by Computer, Image, bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
| render timechart
